title: Provides for the issuance of distinctive license plates with the design "Made in NY"
summary: Provides for the issuance of distinctive license plates with the design "Made in NY"; will provide for an additional twenty-five dollar annual service charge to be placed into an account for economic development; provides for the establishment of the Made in New York state film and television production marketing fund.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         4104

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   February 1, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  MORELLE,  MARKEY,  CANESTRARI,  HOYT, CLARK,
         GUNTHER, DINOWITZ, MILLMAN, BENEDETTO -- Multi-Sponsored by --  M.  of
         A.  ABBATE,  CAHILL,  GALEF, GOTTFRIED, LENTOL, MAGEE, McENENY, PERRY,
         PHEFFER, REILLY, J. RIVERA, SCHIMMINGER,  SWEENEY  --  read  once  and
         referred to the Committee on Transportation

       AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing
         distinctive  license plates for the "Made in NY" program; and to amend
         the state finance law, in relation to establishing  the  Made  in  New
         York state film and television production marketing fund

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The vehicle and traffic law is  amended  by  adding  a  new
    2  section 404-x to read as follows:
    3    S  404-X.  DISTINCTIVE  PLATES  FOR  THE  "MADE IN NY" PROGRAM. 1. ANY
    4  PERSON RESIDING IN THIS STATE SHALL, UPON REQUEST, BE ISSUED A  DISTINC-
    5  TIVE  "MADE IN NY" LICENSE PLATE OF A DESIGN APPROVED BY THE COMMISSION-
    6  ER.  APPLICATION FOR SUCH LICENSE PLATE SHALL BE FILED WITH THE  COMMIS-
    7  SIONER IN SUCH FORM AND DETAIL AS THE COMMISSIONER SHALL PRESCRIBE.
    8    2. A DISTINCTIVE PLATE ISSUED PURSUANT TO THIS SECTION SHALL BE ISSUED
    9  IN  THE SAME MANNER AS OTHER NUMBER PLATES UPON THE PAYMENT OF THE REGU-
   10  LAR REGISTRATION FEE PRESCRIBED BY SECTION  FOUR  HUNDRED  ONE  OF  THIS
   11  ARTICLE,  PROVIDED, HOWEVER, THAT AN ADDITIONAL ANNUAL SERVICE CHARGE OF
   12  TWENTY-FIVE DOLLARS SHALL BE CHARGED FOR SUCH PLATE. SUCH SERVICE CHARGE
   13  SHALL BE DEPOSITED TO THE CREDIT OF THE MADE IN NEW YORK STATE FILM  AND
   14  TELEVISION  PRODUCTION  MARKETING  FUND  ESTABLISHED PURSUANT TO SECTION
   15  NINETY-SEVEN-KKKK OF THE  STATE  FINANCE  LAW  AND  SHALL  BE  USED  FOR
   16  PROGRAMS  UNDERTAKEN  PURSUANT TO SECTION NINETY-SEVEN-KKKK OF THE STATE
   17  FINANCE LAW. PROVIDED, HOWEVER, THAT ONE YEAR AFTER THE  EFFECTIVE  DATE
   18  OF  THIS  SECTION,  FUNDS  IN THE AMOUNT OF FIVE THOUSAND DOLLARS, OR SO
   19  MUCH THEREOF AS MAY BE AVAILABLE, SHALL BE ALLOCATED FROM SUCH  FUND  TO

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06421-01-1

       A. 4104                             2

    1  THE  DEPARTMENT  TO  OFFSET COSTS ASSOCIATED WITH THE PRODUCTION OF SUCH
    2  LICENSE PLATES.
    3    S  2. The state finance law is amended by adding a new section 97-kkkk
    4  to read as follows:
    5    S 97-KKKK. THE MADE IN NEW YORK STATE FILM AND  TELEVISION  PRODUCTION
    6  MARKETING  FUND.  1. THERE IS HEREBY ESTABLISHED IN THE JOINT CUSTODY OF
    7  THE COMMISSIONER OF TAXATION AND FINANCE AND THE COMPTROLLER, A  SPECIAL
    8  FUND  TO  BE  KNOWN  AS  THE  MADE IN NEW YORK STATE FILM AND TELEVISION
    9  PRODUCTION MARKETING FUND.
   10    2. SUCH FUND SHALL CONSIST OF ALL REVENUES  RECEIVED  PURSUANT  TO  AN
   11  APPROPRIATION  BY  THE  LEGISLATURE,  ALL  MONEYS  COLLECTED PURSUANT TO
   12  SECTION FOUR HUNDRED FOUR-X OF THE VEHICLE AND TRAFFIC LAW AND ALL OTHER
   13  MONEYS APPROPRIATED, CREDITED, OR TRANSFERRED  THERETO  FROM  ANY  OTHER
   14  FUND  OR SOURCE PURSUANT TO LAW. NOTHING CONTAINED IN THIS SECTION SHALL
   15  PREVENT THE STATE FROM RECEIVING  GRANTS,  GIFTS  OR  BEQUESTS  FOR  THE
   16  PURPOSES OF THE FUND AS DEFINED IN THIS SECTION AND DEPOSITING THEM INTO
   17  THE FUND ACCORDING TO LAW.
   18    3.  (A)  MONIES  OF THE FUND SHALL BE EXPENDED ONLY FOR FILM AND TELE-
   19  VISION PRODUCTION MARKETING PROGRAMS.
   20    (B) AS USED IN THIS SECTION, FILM AND TELEVISION PRODUCTION  MARKETING
   21  PROGRAMS MEANS ACTIVITIES, APPROVED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF ECONOMIC DEVEL-
   22  OPMENT,  TO  PROMOTE AND ENCOURAGE THE OCCURRENCE, IN THE STATE, OF FILM
   23  AND TELEVISION PRODUCTION.
   24    4. MONIES SHALL BE PAYABLE FROM THE FUND ON THE AUDIT AND  WARRANT  OF
   25  THE  COMPTROLLER  ON VOUCHERS APPROVED AND CERTIFIED BY THE COMMISSIONER
   26  OF ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT.
   27    5. TO THE EXTENT PRACTICABLE, THE COMMISSIONER OF ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT
   28  SHALL ENSURE THAT ALL MONIES RECEIVED DURING A FISCAL YEAR ARE  EXPENDED
   29  PRIOR TO THE END OF THAT FISCAL YEAR.
   30    S 3. This act shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after
   31  it  shall  have become a law. Effective immediately, any rules and regu-
   32  lations required to implement the foregoing provisions of this  act  may
   33  be promulgated on or before such effective date.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing distinctive license plates for the "Made in NY" program; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the Made in New York state film and television production marketing fund
